title: LOGINTER - International Logistics
address-primary: 12 calle 1-25 zona 10, Edificio Geminis 10 Torre norte, nivel 19 Oficina 1906
info3: We integrate the entire supply chain in a single place.
why-us-01: Because we are an agency with extensive experience in local and international logistics.
why-us-02: Because our staff is highly trained to provide logistics solutions.
why-us-03: Because we integrate the entire supply chain in a single place.
why-us-04: Because we offer highly competitive prices.
why-us-05: Because we can also provide you with products, such as raw materials.
service-01-det: Import of air cargo and courier
service-03-det: Import and export of full containers and consolidated cargo.
service-04-det: Local transport of containers and consolidated cargo.
service-05-det: Wholesale and retail sales of products from China or the United States.
service-06-det: Supplier audit in the country of origin.
mision-us-det: We are a logistics agency that provides supply chain solutions to its clients, through our valuable human resources.
vision-us-det: To be a leading company in the supply chain, taking our clients to international trade, being the trade link for micro and macro companies.
quote-info: Contact us to request a quote or inquire about our services
